docs.text:
Vayu 2G/2GP Cape


Descriptions


This M2M cape provides seamless internet connectivity to the Beaglebone via GPRS / 2G network. It also has an optional GPS add-on for location and time synchronization (1pps signal, 2 microsecond jitter accuracy). There are two variants of the cape -


VAYU-2G
 Cape provides Dual band (EGSM 900, DCS 1800) connectivity and thus supports major GSM carriers world-over. The module supports a maximum of 85.6 kbps data rate ideally suited for low-data M2M application needs.


VAYU-2GP
 Cape provides an add-on GPS module integrated with GPRS modem which provides standard compliant NMEA based geo-location and global time synchronization (1pps, 0.2 microsecond jitter accuracy). 


Specifications








Electrical Specifications












Power


3.3V via expansion header








5V via expansion header






Indicators


yes






Connectors


Two 46-position connectors








SMA connectors for GSM and GPS antennas

3.40" x 2.15"






Layers


4






PCB Thickness


.062"






RoHS Compliant


Yes

P9.10

P9.12


Modem Reset














P9.19


I2C Bus for EEPROM






P9.20
















P9.11


GPS NMEA serial data port






P9.13
















P9.14


GPS Module Reset














P9.15








P9.16








P9.17


Modem Serial Data Port






P9.18








P9.24








P9.26
















P8.11


Modem Power On Off






P8.13


Modem Status






P8.14


Modem Wakeup_in / Ring Indicator






P8.17


GPS Module 1 PPS Input

It also has an optional GPS add-on for location and time synchronization (1pps signal, 2 microsecond jitter accuracy). There are two variants of the cape -  VAYU-2G  Cape provides Dual band (EGSM 900, DCS 1800) connectivity and thus supports major GSM carriers world-over. The module supports a maximum of 85.6 kbps data rate ideally suited for low-data M2M application needs.  VAYU-2GP  Cape provides an add-on GPS module integrated with GPRS modem which provides standard compliant NMEA based geo-location and global time synchronization (1pps, 0.2 microsecond jitter accuracy).
